code: export var ACTION_TYPES;(function(ACTION_TYPES){ACTION_TYPES["loadedUsers"]="USERS/LOADED_USERS";ACTION_TYPES["loadedUser"]="USERS/LOADED_USER";})(ACTION_TYPES||(ACTION_TYPES={}));export var LoadedUsersAction=function LoadedUsersAction(payload){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.loadedUsers,payload:payload};};export var LoadedUserAction=function LoadedUserAction(payload){return{type:ACTION_TYPES.loadedUser,payload:payload};};
